Title: KharaPOS
Description: KharaPOS is an Exemplar application for Silverlight 4, WCF RIA Services and .NET Framework 4.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
KharaPOS is an Exemplar application for Silverlight 4, WCF RIA Services and .NET Framework 4.


The goal of KharaPOS is to demonstrate the .NET 4 stack in use within a "real world" scenario. In order to build the app you need to install VS2010 Ultimate RC, Silverlight 4 RC and an available SQL Server 2008 Instance
